greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = (-2)^n*A_{n,3}(1/2) where A_{n,k}(x) are the generalized Eulerian polynomials.
comment: Old name was: row sums in A154594.
formula: E.g.f.: exp(-x)/(2 - exp(-3*x)). (see e.g.f. of row sums of A284861 with x -> -x). - _Wolfdieter Lang_, Jul 12 2017
mathematica: m = 18; CoefficientList[Exp[-x]/(2 - Exp[-3x]) + O[x]^m, x]*Range[0, m-1]! (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jun 19 2019 *)
program: def BB(n, k, x):  # modified cardinal B-splines
if n == 1: return 0 if (x < 0) or (x >= k) else 1
return x*BB(n-1, k, x) + (n*k-x)*BB(n-1, k, x-k)
return add(BB(n+1, k, k*m+1)*x^m for m in (0..n))
xref: Cf. A154594 (row sums), A284861 (row sums if unsigned).
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_, Jan 12 2009
ext: New name and more terms added by _Peter Luschny_, May 04 2013
